resources.name: random-joke-legacy
resources.title: Random joke (legacy endpoint)
resources.description: Fetches one random joke using the original /random_joke route.

resources.name: random-joke
resources.title: Random joke
resources.description: Fetches one random joke. Each joke includes type, setup, and punchline.

resources.name: ten-random-jokes-legacy
resources.title: Ten random jokes (legacy endpoint)
resources.description: Fetches ten random jokes using the older /random_ten route.

resources.name: ten-random-jokes
resources.title: Ten random jokes
resources.description: Returns an array of ten random jokes.

resources.name: available-joke-types
resources.title: Available joke types
resources.description: Lists all available joke categories (e.g., programming, general, knock-knock).

resources.name: random-programming-joke
resources.title: Random programming joke
resources.description: Fetches a single random programming joke from the 'programming' type category.

resources.name: ten-programming-jokes
resources.title: Ten programming jokes
resources.description: Fetches ten random programming jokes for coding-related humor.
